definition: an assistant with power to act when his superior is absent
details:
noun
- an assistant with power to act when his superior is absent
= synonyms: deputy
- an officer in a police force
= synonyms: police lieutenant
- a commissioned military officer
- an officer holding a commissioned rank in the United States Navy or the United States Coast Guard
= example: an officer holding a commissioned rank in the United States Navy or the United States Coast Guard
